languages.text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Жди в тишине и безопасности своих покоев, а для меня охота началась".

traits.locale_text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Жди в тишине и безопасности своих покоев, а для меня охота началась".

languages.text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
languages.original_text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Жди в тишине и безопасности своих покоев, а для меня охота началась".

traits.locale_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

languages.text: «Pronto su espíritu estará en condiciones de seguirme. Espere a salvo y en silencio en sus aposentos. Para mí, la cacería acaba de comenzar».
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: «Pronto su espíritu estará en condiciones de seguirme. Espere a salvo y en silencio en sus aposentos. Para mí, la cacería acaba de comenzar».

languages.text: 「まもなく、あなたの魂は私に従うようになるでしょう。寝室で静かに、安全に待っていてください。私にとっての狩りは始まったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: 「まもなく、あなたの魂は私に従うようになるでしょう。寝室で静かに、安全に待っていてください。私にとっての狩りは始まったのだ」

languages.text: “用不了多久，你的精神就会与我同在。在你安全的房间里耐心等待吧，对我而言，狩猎已经开始了。”
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: “用不了多久，你的精神就会与我同在。在你安全的房间里耐心等待吧，对我而言，狩猎已经开始了。”

languages.text: "Bald wird Euer Geist bereit sein, mir zu folgen. Wartet in der Stille und Sicherheit Eurer Gemächer. Für mich hat die Jagd begonnen."
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: "Bald wird Euer Geist bereit sein, mir zu folgen. Wartet in der Stille und Sicherheit Eurer Gemächer. Für mich hat die Jagd begonnen."

languages.text: « Bientôt, votre esprit sera capable de me suivre. Attendez dans vos quartiers en silence. Pour moi, la chasse a commencé. »
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: « Bientôt, votre esprit sera capable de me suivre. Attendez dans vos quartiers en silence. Pour moi, la chasse a commencé. »

languages.text: "Yakında ruhun beni takip edebilecek. Odanın sükûneti ve emniyetinde bekle. Benim için av başladı."
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. Wait in silence and safety in your chambers. For me, the hunt has begun."
